verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-janma-yātrāte prabhu gopa-veśa hailā
dadhi-bhāra vahi' tabe laguḍa phirāilā

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-janma-yātrāte—on the birthday ceremony of Lord Kṛṣṇa; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gopa-veśa—dressed like a cowherd boy; hailā—was; dadhi-bhāra—a balance for pots of yogurt; vahi'-carrying; tabe—at that time; laguḍa—a rod; phirāilā—wheeled about.
translation: On Janmāṣṭamī, Lord Kṛṣṇa's birthday, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu dressed Himself as a cowherd boy. At that time He carried a balance with pots of yogurt and wheeled a rod about.
